title: Stream Exporter
description: This connector listen to a stream and send the messages to a bucket in Minio. This connector is to be used with the stream-importer connector to synchronize two OpenCTI instances that don't have direct access with each other. The events of the live-stream can be exporter on minio and then re-imported from minio using the stream-importer connector.
